website_summaries.verdict: As budget phones go, the Lumia 650 ticks most of the right boxes, but with Microsoft's phone future looking dim, you may want to pass.
pros: The Lumia 650 has a great design and a price that can't be beat
cons: It's missing some key new Windows phone features, like Continuum and Windows Hello

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleek looking phone.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the refurbished model for £59, came in perfect condition with not a mark on it and the charger still had the protective layer between the pins. Was also delivered 2 days earlier than expected. But it is a Microsoft phone, battery life not great especially if in constant use, but using it as a hotspot as I do it lasts as long as my previous Android. All in not too bad so far.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: A costly mistake.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mobile to replace my Nokia Lumia which I was familiar with. Have only had it for a week and now find that I can’t access my emails. I am able to read the fact there is a message there and the subject but then it just goes back to home screen. Very frustrating. I have been on line trying to get help and it seems to be common occurrence. I have tried the solutions described to no avail. I have and iPad and a PC so can read my emails there but I am very disappointed with this phone. As my family have said - “should have got an iPhone”
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic smart phone!
customer_reviews.text: Bargain price for a smart phone that does so much! I am very impressed with this Windows phone and very happy with it. It's no iPhone or Android - it is Windows and if you like Windows 10, you're laughing.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: A smooth operator!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to use and takes Windows updates with ease. (in 2 months use no crashes or problems) Syncing with Windows, using a Microsoft account, on other devices is easy and faultless. At £99 it was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: David Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone. I am a big ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this phone. I am a big fan of Microsoft but twice I have owned this make and model and twice in one year, two different phones, the screen developed a hairline crack on the inside of the phone. The phone itself works, but you will be unable to see the screen once this crack appears. Microsoft will NOT repair this under warranty. I have found lots of people with the same issue. This will just appear with NO reason at all. Lovely phone but not worth the risk!
customer_reviews.author: LB_82

customer_reviews.title: do not bye this phone really terrible had problems ever since I bought it every time ...
customer_reviews.text: do not bye this phone really terrible had problems ever since I bought it every time I lock the phone it keeps turning off I sent it away a couple off months ago to sored out the problem It did for a bit then recently it stated doing it again now I emailed them and said Is it alright to get my money back no response I keep emailing them they are just ignoring me really poor.
customer_reviews.author: David Buchan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This was a refurbished phone and sadly didn’t work for long .
customer_reviews.author: Roy Denton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Initially it would not hold its charge for more than 12 hours. Contacted the company and Nathan sent me instructions on how to soft reset. He stated that if this didn't work I could return it for refund or replacement. But it did work and I am very pleased with the phone. Thank you Nathan
customer_reviews.author: BEV

customer_reviews.title: Love the Windows feature
customer_reviews.text: Great phone I used it for 2 years, although the battery life does not last long, and it does not work with some of the apps. a really good phone to use.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: the battery life is poor. Need I say more
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several Microsoft phones now and I wouldn't get another one. The browser is temperamental to say the least, it takes ages to power up, the apps are limited, the battery life is poor. Need I say more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: Good looking phone
customer_reviews.text: Good looking phone, very similar in looks to the Samsung A5 but runs Windows which I really wanted. Had the phone for 6 months now and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: peter a

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price. Good replacement for my old iPhone saving me gazillions of replacement costs.Bought as a present for an older relative, and easy to use compared to Android for a new, non-tech user. Lack of app support is the only real drawback.
customer_reviews.author: d8smt

customer_reviews.title: Locked mobile sold as sim-free
customer_reviews.text: The Lumia 650 was delivered on time. It was received in good condition, but the phone is locked to the previous operator despite being sold as sim-free. I've only just got around to putting a sim card in it and getting it ready for use. Drat!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for my mum however we can't put her ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for my mum however we can't put her ringtones back on. If anyone could help me with this, that would be great. Followed instruction manual but didn't work
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: All ok get most things on like Face Book
customer_reviews.text: All ok get most things on like Face Book , Instagram , Amazon but no Ebay as an app. all ok tho works well long battery life which is good .
customer_reviews.author: JANINE ALMA PRYKE

customer_reviews.title: Ace.
customer_reviews.text: Great, much better than the awful iPhones I've had. I'm not too bothered about mind numbing apps so suits me. Mrs wants one now, so hold onto your hat tech. support.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cowin

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Hopefully
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She hates it. I like it. Hopefully, the next Windows 10 Anniversary Update will improve it significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased thus far. Will have to get used to many aspects of it but so far just great. Nice price too. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Sorry too say but it was faulty the screen was ...
customer_reviews.text: Sorry too say but it was faulty the screen was flashing on off straight from the box when switched on plus text that should be white was green and text that was black had green shadows out off focus could not read sometimes black background was purple with lines across screen so have sent it back for refund
customer_reviews.author: steven girdham

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Works very well. Well designed. Has all the essential apps. The others that are missing are a waste of time. Connects to Windows 10 pc, perfectly. Had a number of Lumia handsets, all have been first class. Its proven to be the most stable OS for me. The others are ok, but this is simple, yet powerful. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1st Class !!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant value, like brand new , exactly as seller described it . Very pleased and would recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: alan warr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: A great low cost phone - prefer to my old iphones and on a par with my samsung S6 smartphone. However I use this for business so don't load it with loads of apps/photos/music. Holds charge well
customer_reviews.author: Crj

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: If only some of the notification's will make a sound like Nokia did, maybe i didn't set it up right, Battery will last a day MAX, but only with limited calls, apart from that, then this phone is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: music mad

customer_reviews.title: A good looking phone.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly use for messages, email and Facebook plus occasional buying of things. What i didn't like was automated voice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I want
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone that does everything I want and more. The voice recognition makes texting, emailing and social media a breeze, and the phone offers greater value than Android.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crouch

customer_reviews.title: you will not better this, i
customer_reviews.text: For the price , you will not better this, i,m all Windows 10 sorry.......lol
customer_reviews.author: Steve Workman

customer_reviews.title: Windows phone
customer_reviews.text: Very quick on delivery and in good condition, only draw back is the battery life but I will replace it later, otherwise very happy thanks
customer_reviews.author: David Murray

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. I haven't had it long enough to find any negatives, apart from not being able to use my BT email address. The screen is clear and easy to use. It was easy to set up, too.
customer_reviews.author: jude the obscure

customer_reviews.title: ... had this phone for a couple of weeks really pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Although I have only had this phone for a couple of weeks really pleased with it, easy transition from my lap top which also uses windows ten.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good for calls, windows 10 no longer supported
customer_reviews.text: Great slim light phone. Just a shame windows 10 is no longer supported so can't get Facebook YouTube etc
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Twyford

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to replace an old handset. Excellent condition and considering refurbished I was pleasantly surprised at how new it looked. Easy to use and great battery life
customer_reviews.author: where I'd rather be

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and very capable phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and very capable phone. W10 is so much better than apple or android based phones. Given it is a fraction of the price of top end iphones or samsungs it is a bargain. A great phone that thinks its also a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: g deighton

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Very good mobile. Bought it for my daughter. It was easy to set up. Very good value for used item.
customer_reviews.author: kaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for normal use!
customer_reviews.text: A good low cost Lumia phone. Recent software update have improved battery lif and overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ayhan Dursun

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice phone it is light and easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to replace my previous Nokia but as I broke it, I had to invest! This is a really nice phone it is light and easy to use and a significant improvement.
customer_reviews.author: supercountrycat

customer_reviews.title: Was brilliant then screen went black
customer_reviews.text: This phone has turned black and stopped working. Only bought it as a bday present a few months ago. I cant seem to email the seller. So what can I do?
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A bargain price for a very nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, replaceable battery, nano SD slot, an excellent choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone even Better OS
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the Apps ecosystem,Windows Mobile OS is just the best.The start screen is one of the best highlights.The way I can pin all what's important to me on the start screen, giving me easy access and good visibility is just brilliant.And the 650 performs pretty well across the board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hang in there
customer_reviews.text: While not a Nokia phone, this is an OK Windows 10 Mobile phone. The display is great. For more stars, the OS would have to become more stable. As it is now, there is something every week.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pavek

customer_reviews.title: ... nokia 920 can't fault it windows phone users will love
customer_reviews.text: upgraded from nokia 920 can't fault it windows phone users will love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone, good condition
customer_reviews.text: A good sturdy phone in very good condition. Transferring data from my old Lumia 520 was a doddle. I'm glad to see that most win10 apps work as well as the old win8 ones but faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: Had it one month and it stopped texting. Crashed when loading applications and turned itself off when placed on standby.
customer_reviews.author: j c allison

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Better value than I have seen elsewhere. Works well and is as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kibbles

customer_reviews.title: ... a upgrade to the 720 but it's nowhere as good don't wast you
customer_reviews.text: Got this as replacement for a Nokia 720 had to return it as it kept shutting down this is ment to be a upgrade to the 720 but it's nowhere as good don't wast you money
customer_reviews.author: A. Hitchings

customer_reviews.title: instructions in Polish not what i expect when i purchase an item directly from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were only in Polish as is the guarantee which is very annoying I do expect an item bought from Amazon to have a set of instructions and guarantee I can read Phone itself is great, all I would want from a phone - now I have worked out how to get it set
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my Android. Better functionality more stable platform, and less information collected by Google.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Croydon

customer_reviews.title: good support from Microsoft pity about the battery life
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, good support from Microsoft pity about the battery life.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed would not switch on and damaged internal screen gutted

customer_reviews.title: The Nokia Lumia 650 Windows smartphone is good, but the Mobile was locked to EE Provider
customer_reviews.text: The Nokia Lumia 650 Windows smartphone is good, but the Mobile was locked to EE Provider, I had to unlock the Mobile to EE with a Windows code which I had to pay.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a stolen smartphone very pleased with the performance and specification -- good value for money.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality

customer_reviews.text: Cannot start it will not respond -Not charging have had 3 Micro soft phones and have tried on 3 different chargers. What happens now.c

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bit hard to get used to, but mastering it now with numerous online "how to" videos

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Always had Nokia phones and find windows phones very easy to use. Takes good photos.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased and fast import of contacts from old windows lumia 625. Nice and light.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone. The specifications are more than enough to run Windows Mobile 10. Great device for business employees.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous phone, leaves IOS and Android in the dark ages.

customer_reviews.title: surprised at how good they are
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these, surprised at how good they are.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy l have ever made
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy l have ever made . Can't wait for my contact to finish on my other phone as signal is very poor. This one never loses signal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had a widows phone & this one i found great from the moment i switched it on really clear ...
customer_reviews.text: i previously had a widows phone & this one i found great from the moment i switched it on really clear screen & simple windows controls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay to use but cannot use mobile data and wifi connection constantly breaks down. Besides limited apps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Colour
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sent a White phone, not a Black one as advertised !
customer_reviews.author: Rib

customer_reviews.title: Need a smartphone?
customer_reviews.text: Meets all the requirements of a smartphone user at extremely reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.Reza Meshkat

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous Microsoft
customer_reviews.text: Very light, easy to use and looks good. Only had it a day but am impressed so far. Don't know how good the battery will be, but can't think it'll be worse than any other that I've had in the past, as I don't use my phone constantly. Connects to internet quickly and syncs with my emails well (have laptop and desktop PC with Windows 10, so this is just a mini version.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Low/Mid range Windows 10 phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my wife and she is very happy with it. We all run Windows phones in this household and find them far superior to the equivalent apple/android phones. It helps that we all have Windows 10 PCs as well so transfering files etc is so easy using onedrive.
customer_reviews.author: Splingle

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: After having the Lumia 550 which was quite basic i thought would upgrade myself to the 650 and have to say with its speedy performance it is a very well suited phone its very thin which is nice and has a much bigger screen would highly recommend this. It is running the latest Windows 10 Mobile OS and maybe it doesn't have every single app out there but has some very unique apps that IOS or Android lack such as the capability to beam a photo or video to the TV without buying any additional hardware
customer_reviews.author: TTUK

customer_reviews.title: I give mine a good thrashing each day and it has always lasted the ...
customer_reviews.text: My Lumia 635 was playing up so purchased the 650. It arrived really quickly and securely. Don't believe all that's said about the battery life, I give mine a good thrashing each day and it has always lasted the day (at least). Does take a good time to recharge though. Well pleased with the product and would recommend it to anyone , like me on a tight budget that cannot afford the 950.
customer_reviews.author: yeti g

customer_reviews.title: This is my third Windows Phone and I'm really disappointed that they seen to be coming to an end- ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Windows Phone and I'm really disappointed that they seen to be coming to an end- they integrate seamlessly with windows laptop, desktop and tablet so you have your contacts, messages and even desktop background consistent across all your devices. The screen size makes the phone seem a bit big in the hand atm but it is larger than the Lumia 735 it replaced and that seemed massive when it arrived and perfectly normal now. It's a real shame that hotmail / live users don't go with these phones as they do work brilliantly to back up contacts & sync mail with your webmail account.
customer_reviews.author: A C Clarke

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded in all good faith, I should have stayed with my old phone. This one's battery is totally unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to become familiar with it, am very pleased. There are so many apps. Most of which I probably will not use. But they are there when I do need them. "Now after a little while to get used to the phone am sadly very disappointed. The battery is Abysmal. From full charge at 1200 (noon) say, just being used for 5 emails and 8 texts it needs recharging by 1930 (7.30pm). There does not appear to be any way to disable unwanted apps. Battery saving is a farce. It does nothing at all. Very, very disappointed."
customer_reviews.author: Spotty Urchin

customer_reviews.title: Performance and style and Windows 10 too
customer_reviews.text: A big improvement on my previous Nokia 520. This one is bigger, thinner and lighter. Build quality is good. Crisp, clear display. Good sound quality and very stylish, glad I went for the white version. Transferring my data and apps from my old phone was easy and I was up and running in well under 30 minutes. Would certainly recommend this as a replacement if your old Win7/8.x phone is starting to look and feel a bit jaded.
customer_reviews.author: Gobbledegeek

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife, she loves it easy to use and she loves the fact everything is backed up and shared between her laptop and her phone. TO be honest she is a little bit of a techno phobe but she used this phone all the time, first one ever.
customer_reviews.author: Si

customer_reviews.title: Love the Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone and the interface. Bought from Warehouse but in perfect condition. Working arround the app gap ok so far hence 4 stars. I also have old android tablet (Sami Galaxy Tab 7.7 still wonderful by the way after 6 years same battery and standard build) for apps I need if not on 650. I was pleased to hand my Iphone in when left company.
customer_reviews.author: Louis V.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I've been a big fan of Lumia phones for a while. Since Nokia became Microsoft the final quality of the product has plummeted. Apart from the awful lack of competitive apps, the stability of Windows 10 is poor to say the least. On the top of it, the 650 processor is so weak it makes the phone laggy and annoying to use. On the upsides, the phone has a very good built in quality. Mine has suffered a few major impacts and the screen is unsullied. The phone is very light and looks like a flagship (a bloodily slow flagship). Value for money is not awful, but I wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Supplier's service went the extra mile!
customer_reviews.text: Phone is excellent, as expected. There were software problems with the handset first supplied, but as soon as notified, supplier cheapphonesonline attempted to resolve the issue and when unable to do so, even after direct landline contact, sent out a replacement handset by special delivery which arrived by 10.00am next day. They also later pointed to the solution for a further minor glitch in setting up the now fully operational handset. Also arranged for the return of the defective handset. Top marks!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lillies

customer_reviews.title: Lumia 650
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the phones and would recommend this phone for both quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ascot

customer_reviews.title: Until now very happy. nice camera and good price
customer_reviews.text: Until now very happy. nice camera and good price, very good Smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: AnaMoon

customer_reviews.title: Lumia 650
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phone but battery life is to short, at the moment it is only lasting one day of light use. Still trying to move things around to get longer battery life.
customer_reviews.author: glynie 38

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone its everything I need in a phone, arrived early
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Phone Locked!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone for my grandmother who lives abroad. When she received the phone, she was unable to use it as the phone was locked. Amazon were completely unable to help with getting unlocked! The description of the phone is wrong and misleading. s
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: problem it did not work but got a full refund, with out any problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rejected sim after 2 weeks and will not acknowledge new one. Cannot use as phone
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Except. I had a previos SIM card cut down to nano as I had money left on it. All ok for about two weeks. Then the device suddenly rejected the SIM card and would not allow me to re insert it. I therefore purchased a new sim which it accepted into the slot but the device kept telling me there was no connection. So I cannot use this as a phone.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: and excellent value. Compares with the more expensive Apple and ...
customer_reviews.text: Brillaint screen, lightweight, and excellent value. Compares with the more expensive Apple and Samsung mobile phones

customer_reviews.title: it is an excelent product, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it is an excelent product, and easy to use. it is basically mobile computer. i am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this phone. I purchased it as I use one at work so was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tucks

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the phone until I discovered the lack of Apps ...
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the phone until I discovered the lack of Apps you have access to. Though you cant beat the price and it's super lightweight. I'd reccommend securing the pack plate to the phone as the battery always flies out if you drop it and the phone is a big fan of closing the few apps I do have when I am using them 🙃 My friend bought the newer version of this and seems to have a lot more perks!
customer_reviews.author: jauntybean

customer_reviews.title: This phone is causing me a lot of problem although ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is causing me a lot of problem although I bought it new, it is slow and many apps are not functionning properly (i.e. I cannot access them and they quit as soon as I click on it). Many other pb such as the loading of images or sounds via Whatsapp that would randomly not work, no connection between images and apps to share files so I have to directly take a picture if I want to share it. The list is long, as a cheap phone it does the job but If you want a phone that works perfectly just don't buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: noramarouane

customer_reviews.title: which i find is better, and have since
customer_reviews.text: A little disapointed,in this phone,ive got the older model,which i find is better,and have since,started to use it again
customer_reviews.author: paul m.

customer_reviews.title: A much needed replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for one that got very wet! Much better camera than the previous version and works well on the windows platform
customer_reviews.author: Greg Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with the Lumia 650
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with the Lumia 650. The user interface is not good and apps constantly hang. In addition, there are far few apps for this phone which makes it less of a smartphone. There are a few design flaws which Microsoft should have addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lumia 650
customer_reviews.text: A very good phone battery life could be better happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michael O.

customer_reviews.title: faulty
customer_reviews.text: i cant contact customer services bought this as a chrstmas present the person has only just said its faulty the card reader is not reading any sim . I want to return it for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: mr james richer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The most rubbish phone I have ever owned. The battery doesn't last a full day and nothing runs well on it. I've had two Nokia Lumia's before this and both were lovely, really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great value phone
customer_reviews.text: Wanted replacement for my wife's faithful iPhone 4 (tired battery). Having been delighted with 640, especially upgraded to Windows 10 Mobile, I encouraged her to switch Operating Systems in order to save hundreds of £. Sure there are apps not available on Windows phones but for someone who wants phone, messaging, email and Facebook then this is perfect ... and the battery can be replaced. Normal excellent Amazon service.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Watson

customer_reviews.title: OK the product is good Vale for money
customer_reviews.text: OK the product is good Vale for money, but some issues with amazon as my package was not sealed and two accessories were missing in it (headphones and USB cable) never expected this from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hayaan

customer_reviews.title: Good phone when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: Probably will be my first and my last Windows phone. After updates it becomes a useless slab of plastic. It would've been better with Android than a horrible Windows OS and I use Windows as my main. I expected better for £170 which is actually a disappointing price for a cheaply built device. Having an OS that fails miserably and I regret not getting a refund the moment I even turned on the phone. Either Microsoft should step up their game at a smooth OS or just quit the mobile market as it isn't even worth trying to get into. Not worth getting even more than 2 stars. Horrible phone, horrible OS and just generally horrible mobile platform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Resuming..."you will see this message often
customer_reviews.text: Too slooooow! every single app is too slow! Every single click takes you to a "resuming" message until you get where you want to go. Applications crash often... Battery life is a joke... Lack of apps, example: cannot install youtube, gmail, mozila, chrome. If I could I would ask my money back
customer_reviews.author: gil

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: screen broke after 6 months ( no not cracked) as in went blank and nada, zzzzerrrrrrrrroooooo
customer_reviews.author: Wully black

product_meta.title: Microsoft Lumia 650 UK SIM-Free Smartphone - White no warranty
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT : MICROSOFT LUMIA 650 SINGLE SIM FACTORY UNLOCKED 4G/LTE CELL PHONE

COLOUR : WHITE

MEMORY : 16GB

MODEL NO : RM-1152 - SINGLE SIM

SIMCARD TYPE : NANO-SIM

FREQUENCIES : COMPATIBLE TO USE WITH NETWORK SIM CARDS THAT WORKS ON

2G : GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 and/or 

3G : 850(B5) / 900(B8) / 2100(B1) and/or

4G : LTE 800(B20) / 900(B8) / 1800(B3) / 2100(B1) / 2600(B7) 

IMPORTANT : PLEASE CHECK WITH YOUR NETWORK PROVIDER THE COMPATIBILITY BEFORE YOU BUY.

IN THE BOX :

1 X Nokia Lumia 650 Single SIM Cell Phone

1 X Battery

1 X Battery Door Cover

1 X Mains / Wall / Travel Charger Adaptor

1 X Documentation

1 X Interior Retail Packing

1 X Retail Box with IMEI Number

Note : The standard handset package does not include a Handsfree or PC Connecting Cable. This is the manufacturer's standard package.
feature_bullets: For USA Buyers : This Smartphone is compatible/will work with any GSM Networks such as AT&T, T-Mobile. For exact 2G GSM, 3G, 4G/LTE compatibility, please check with your network provider in advance prior to your purchase. This phone WILL NOT WORK with any CDMA Networks such as VERIZON, SPRINT, US CELLULAR.
